DisplayName.value: White River Tools of Citizenship - Black Bart's Flaming Dig Tools

Description.value: Gather tons of iron and craft a bunch of Iron Pickaxe and Shovels to obtain a set of named Flaming Steel Shovel and Pickaxe tools.

Author.value: ShoudenKalferas(Code), morggin(Lore), AeyviDaro(Quest Text), RichardPaul(Poem), 7DaystoDie.JP, PaLoALo, ArkAngel
